title: Luxury Retreat in New Zealand's Largest Wine Region with Outdoor Heated Pool
description: Discover a sophisticated stay like none other at The Marlborough - Boutique Hotel & Vineyard, a luxury retreat nestled among the vines of New Zealand's most world-renowned wine region. With 16 acres of established gardens and lush vineyards as your backdrop, you and your special someone will love creating lasting memories, whether strolling the grounds and sipping the estate's own wine, tasting seasonal gourmet dishes at Harvest restaurant, or enjoying a sunny day with a game of petanque or croquet and a cool down in the glistening outdoor pool. Tours of the extensive grounds with the estate's manager are available, should you wish to enjoy your wine experience to the fullest.
